localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Ecosia – A search engine that plants trees
blogPost.author: fossislife

previous.excerpt:
I'm not new to the market but news seems to move faster than I can keep up. How
did a stock for a company on it's last leg surge so much and so fast? What is
this "squeeze". Not jumping on this wagon because I have my own investing
strategy, but can someone explain the situation?
previous.title: Can someone ELI5, what's going on with $GME?

localize.title: 谁能ELI5，通用汽车E是怎么回事？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我对市场并不陌生，但消息面似乎比我跟得更快。怎么会
一个公司的股票在它的最后一站暴涨这么多，这么快？什么是
这种 "挤压"。不跳上这架马车，是因为我有自己的投资
策略，但谁能解释一下这种情况？

localize.title: 誰能ELI5，通用汽車E是怎麼回事？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我對市場並不陌生，但消息面似乎比我跟得更快。怎麼會
一個公司的股票在它的最後一站暴漲這麼多，這麼快？什麼是
這種 "擠壓"。不跳上這架馬車，是因爲我有自己的投資
策略，但誰能解釋一下這種情況？
